title: The Answer is Always Miata - /TUNED
description: Ask any car guy, what would make a good first car? Miata. What would make a good weekend car? Miata. What would make a good tuner car? Miata. What would be a good race car? Miata. What could I drive that Chris Harris won't like? Miata. It seems the answer is always Miata. This week, CJ Wilson Racing and Continental Tire invite us to Austin, TX to test two of their best Miatas on the track.
tags: Mazda Miata, MX-5, Miata, Harris Hill Raceway, V8 Miata
